0.1.name: wordpress/tweet-you
0.1.description:
Putting twitter on your website with tweet!, an unobtrusive javascript plugin for jquery.

The original code is from http://tweet.seaofclouds.com/ and it uses the power of jQuery to twitter to your website in a widget. Just set install, add the widget, set your username and you are on your way!

See it in action at http://seaofclouds.com/ and http://benjaminsterling.com.

Need this plugin customized or need a plugin created, contact me via my contact form at http://kenzomedia.com

Also available through twitter, @bmsterling
